languages.text: [Улыбнуться сквозь боль] "Благодарю за танец, но... давай остановимся и повторим в другой раз. Когда ты не будешь так отвлечен".
[Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться сквозь боль] "Благодарю за танец, но... давай остановимся и повторим в другой раз. Когда ты не будешь так отвлечен".

traits.locale_text: [Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop now and do it again some other time. When you aren't as distracted."
[Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop now and do it again some other time. When you aren't as distracted."
[Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We will pick it again some other time, when you aren't as distracted."

[Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."
[Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."

languages.text: [痛みをこらえて微笑む] 「踊ってくれてありがとう。でも、今はここまでにしよう。君の心が乱れていない時に、また続きを」
languages.original_text: [Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."

traits.locale_text: [痛みをこらえて微笑む] 「踊ってくれてありがとう。でも、今はここまでにしよう。君の心が乱れていない時に、また続きを」

languages.text: [Sonreír a pesar del dolor] «Gracias por el baile, pero... será mejor parar. Podemos retomarlo en otra ocasión, cuando haya menos distracciones».
languages.original_text: [Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír a pesar del dolor] «Gracias por el baile, pero... será mejor parar. Podemos retomarlo en otra ocasión, cuando haya menos distracciones».

languages.text: [Sourire dans la douleur] « Merci pour la danse, mais... restons-en là pour l'instant. Nous reprendrons un peu plus tard, quand vous n'aurez pas la tête ailleurs. »
languages.original_text: [Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire dans la douleur] « Merci pour la danse, mais... restons-en là pour l'instant. Nous reprendrons un peu plus tard, quand vous n'aurez pas la tête ailleurs. »

languages.text: [忍住疼痛，露出笑容]“谢谢你邀请我跳舞，不过……还是先停一下吧。我们可以改天重新跳支舞，等你没那么心不在焉的时候再说吧。”
languages.original_text: [Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."

traits.locale_text: [忍住疼痛，露出笑容]“谢谢你邀请我跳舞，不过……还是先停一下吧。我们可以改天重新跳支舞，等你没那么心不在焉的时候再说吧。”

languages.text: [Trotz deiner Schmerzen lächeln] "Danke für den Tanz, aber ... lassen wir es gut sein. Wir können ein andermal weitermachen, wenn Ihr nicht so abgelenkt seid."
languages.original_text: [Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."

traits.locale_text: [Trotz deiner Schmerzen lächeln] "Danke für den Tanz, aber ... lassen wir es gut sein. Wir können ein andermal weitermachen, wenn Ihr nicht so abgelenkt seid."

languages.text: [Acılarına rağmen gülümse] "Dans için teşekkür ederim ama... Şimdilik ara verelim. Başka bir zaman, zihnin bu kadar meşgul değilken kaldığımız yerden devam ederiz."
languages.original_text: [Smile through your pain] "Thank you for the dance, but... let's stop for now. We can pick this up some other time, when you aren't as distracted."
